title: Paris-Nice: Brandon McNulty into Lead as Rain Puts Damper on Roglič-Evenepoel TTT Showdown
content:
American slots into the overall lead at the 'Race to the Sun' as rain and wind impact the team time trial stage: 'Some of the speeds were crazy.'

Read the full article at Paris-Nice: Brandon McNulty into Lead as Rain Puts Damper on Roglič-Evenepoel TTT Showdown on Velo.
author: ahood
